spell.name: armour
spell.up: A blue transparent wall slowly appears around you.

spell.name: strength
spell.refresh: The duration of the strength spell has been improved.

spell.name: bless
spell.up: You begin to feel the light of Aman shine upon you.
spell.refresh: You feel a renewed light shine upon you.
spell.down: The light of Aman fades away from you.

spell.name: sense life
spell.down: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

spell.name: sanctuary
spell.down: The white aura around your body fades.

spell.name: detect magic
spell.up: You become sensitive of magical auras.
spell.refresh: Your awareness of magical auras is renewed.
spell.down: Your perception of magical auras wears off.

spell.name: tiredness
spell.up: You feel your muscles relax and your pulse slow as the strength that welled within you subsides.
spell.down: You feel your muscles regain some of their former energy.

spell.name: haggardness
spell.up: You feel a sudden flash of dizziness causing you to pause before getting your directional bearings back.

spell.name: lethargy
spell.up: You feel a sudden loss of energy as the power that once mingled with your own has now vanished.
spell.down: You feel your magic energy coming back to you.

spell.name: blindness
spell.down: You feel a cloak of blindness dissolve.

spell.name: battleglory
spell.up: Hearing the horn blow, you feel your urge to battle increase!
spell.down: You feel your newfound strength leaving you again.

spell.name: breath of briskness
spell.up: An energy begins to flow within your legs as your body becomes lighter.
spell.refresh: The energy in your legs is refreshed.
